Optwrf Documentation¶

About¶

Optwrf is a Python package that aids in selecting weather research and forecasting (WRF) physics parameters for the purpose of wind and solar energy integration.

License¶

This is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms Of the BSD 3-clause License. A copy of this license is provided in LICENSE.txt.
